description: The Philadelphia Zoo has long been active in Galápagos tortoise conservation—giants native to the Ecuadorian archipelago. Arriving in the zoo in the 1940s, it had never exhibited any inclination for mating. But lately, staff members paired him with a 35-year-old female called Estrella based on behavioral changes.
title: 100-Year-Old Tortoise Starts His First-Time Fatherhood at Philadelphia Zoo

description: Shubhanshu Shublha, the first Indian to join a crewed expedition to a space station, is preparing to launch into space in May. The journey fits into India's wider goal of maintaining a continuous human presence in space.
title: ISRO’s Shubhanshu Shukla Set to Make History with Space Station Mission in May

description: The Lyrid meteor shower is set to return on April 22, marking the first major meteor display in months. Visibility should be strong this year thanks to minimal moonlight during peak hours before dawn. The Lyrids will radiate from near the star Vega, with meteors visible every few minutes. Western US viewers may benefit most from the predicted timing, while fireball sightings are also possible between April 23–25. Past events have included brief outbursts and rare fireball events, making this an exciting watch for sky enthusiasts.
title: Lyrid Meteor Shower 2025 Peaks April 22 With Fireballs and Clear Skies Expected

description: NASA’s Parker Solar Probe completed a close flyby of the Sun on March 22, travelling at 692,000 kilometres per hour and approaching within 6.1 million kilometres of the solar surface. The mission, designed to study solar winds and space weather, received a healthy signal back on March 25. The team, including NASA and Johns Hopkins APL experts, has been awarded the 2024 Collier Trophy for this achievement. The next flyby is expected in June.
title: NASA’s Parker Solar Probe Completes Second Close Flyby of the Sun at Record Speed

description: NASA's Perseverance Mars rover's navigation camera captured a Martian dust devil swallowing a smaller one. The smaller dust devil's demise was captured during an imaging experiment carried out by Perseverance's science team to better understand the dynamics at work in the Martian atmosphere. In the 1970s, NASA's Viking orbiters became the first spacecraft to picture Martian dust devils.
title: NASA's Perseverance Rover Captures One Dust Devil Devouring Another

description: PayPal and Venmo have expanded their crypto offering with two new tokens -- Chainlink (LINK) and Solana (SOL). On CoinMarketCap, Chainlink is the 13th largest crypto by market cap whereas Solana holds the 7th position.
title: PayPal, Venmo Expand Crypto Offering with LINK, SOL Tokens Owing to User Feedback

description: A trio of Russian Kosmos satellites launched earlier this year has released an unidentified object in orbit, drawing international attention. First observed on March 18, the object remains unexplained, and Russian authorities have yet to comment. Experts believe the event may be linked to military or satellite testing, especially as the satellites were seen performing proximity operations before the release. The mystery deepens as monitoring continues.
title: Russian Kosmos Satellites Release Mysterious Object in Orbit

description: Motorola, the wholly owned subsidiary of Lenovo, is all set to expand its product lineup in India. The tech brand which sells a range of smartphones in the country will soon bring new laptops for Indian consumers. Motorola confirmed the foray into the laptop market through a teaser on Flipkart.
title: Motorola to Launch a Laptop in India Soon; to Be Available on Flipkart

description: OpenAI is reportedly discussing the possibility of buying CEO Sam Altman and Jony Ive’s artificial intelligence (AI) startup. The unnamed startup was reportedly founded last year and is building AI-powered devices. As per the report, the San Francisco-based AI firm is considering a full acquisition as well as a partnership deal with the startup.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Wants to Acquire Jony Ive and Sam Altman’s Startup That’s Building a New AI Device

description: Redmi Buds 7S have been introduced in China as a successor to the Redmi Buds 6S. The latest TWS earphones are claimed to offer a total battery life of up to 32 hours including the case. They support active noise cancellation (ANC) and SoundID-based audio personalisation. The earphones support Xiaomi’s self-developed HRTF algorithm, which is said to offer a 360-degree spatial audio experience.
title: Redmi Buds 7S With Spatial Audio, Up to 32 Hours Battery Life Launched: Price, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is reportedly set to launch on May 13. As we wait for the official launch date announcement, the handset has allegedly appeared on e-commerce websites in Europe, hinting at its pricing and storage configurations. The leaked price tags would put the Galaxy S25 Edge right between the Galaxy S25+ and Galaxy S25 Ultra. The slim flagship is said to ship in two storage options.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge European Price Details, Storage Variants Leaked

description: SpaceX has resumed Pacific Ocean splashdowns with its Crew Dragon capsule Resilience, marking a shift in its recovery strategy. The move comes after concerns over falling debris and a desire for more control during reentry. This method was once standard until 2019, before splashdowns shifted to Florida. SpaceX now separates the trunk section earlier to ensure debris lands safely in the ocean. The successful Fram2 mission marks the start of a long-term return to the west coast route for crewed missions.
title: SpaceX's Fram2 Mission Ends with Historic West Coast Splashdown

description: Vivo T4 5G is teased to launch in India later this month. Previous leaks and reports have suggested some key specifications and expected colour options for the upcoming handset. Now, another report has reiterated the launch timeline of the smartphone and suggested some features including display and chipset details.
title: Vivo T4 5G Key Features Surface Online Again; Tipped to Get Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC

description: Apple is appealing against a British government order to create a "back door" to its encrypted cloud storage systems. Apple believes that once created, this  o-called backdoor could be exploited by hackers in addition to governments, a sentiment echoed by security experts.
title: Apple Appealing Against UK 'Back Door' Order, Tribunal Confirms

description: Bungie is finally ready to show gameplay for its upcoming shooter Marathon. The studio will reveal Marathon gameplay in a showcase set for later this week on April 12. Bungie also shared a brief teaser alongside the announcement, showing off environments from one of the game’s maps.
title: Bungie Set to Reveal Marathon Gameplay in a Showcase This Week

description: ByteDance confirmed it’s in discussions with the US government about plans to keep TikTok running in the US. For the second time now, US President Donald Trump extended a deadline for the Chinese company to divest the app’s American operations. The latest extension permits the president to give a “one-time extension of not more than 90 days.
title: ByteDance Confirms US Talks on TikTok After Trump Gives 75-Day Extension for Deal to Save App

description: CMF Phone 2 Pro is set to be unveiled in India and globally later this month, the company announced on Monday. The purported handset is expected to debut as the successor to the CMF Phone 1 which was launched in September 2023. Alongside, the Nothing subsidiary will also announce its new lineup of true-wireless-stereo (TWS) earbuds comprising the CMF Buds 2, CMF Buds 2a, and the CMF Buds 2 Pro.
title: CMF Phone 2 Pro India Launch Set for April 28; CMF Buds 2, Buds 2a, Buds 2 Plus to Tag Along

description: Google moved the Gemini 2.5 Pro artificial intelligence (AI) model to public preview last week. The Mountain View-based tech giant released its latest flagship tier AI model last week as an experimental preview with limited rate limits. But now, those using the Gemini application programming interface (API) or accessing the model via the Google AI Studio will get higher rate limits.
title: Google Moves Gemini 2.5 Pro to Public Preview, Offers Higher Rate Limits in AI Studio

description: iQOO’s Neo 10R checks all the boxes for a proper mid-range smartphone. This would include a powerful processor, a capable display, a massive battery with fast wired charging and a capable set of cameras. However, not everything is as it appears to be as we found out in our review.
title: iQOO Neo 10R Review: Excellent Value for Money?

description: JBL has introduced the Tune Series 2 TWS earphones in India. The lineup includes the JBL Tune Buds 2, Tune Beam 2 and Tune Flex 2 headsets. They support adaptive noise cancellation, spatial sound, multi-point connectivity, and Google Fast Pair. Users can customise several features to personalise their audio experiences with the JBL Headphones app.
title: JBL Tune Buds 2, Tune Beam 2 and Tune Flex 2 With ANC, Spatial Sound Launched in India

description: inZOI has crossed one million copies sold in a week after it launched in Early Access on Steam, publisher Krafton announced Friday. Seen as a competitor to Electronic Arts’ The Sims franchise, inZOI has become the fastest Krafton game ever to reach the sales milestone.
title: Krafton's The Sims Competitor inZOI Crosses 1 Million Copies Sold in a Week After Steam Early Access Launch

description: Microsoft announced several new features for its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, Copilot, last week. The Redmond-based tech giant said that these features will enable the AI chatbot to deliver a more personalised experience to users. Some of the new features were previously available only on the web client, and are now being expanded to its mobile and Windows desktop apps.
title: Microsoft’s Copilot AI Upgraded With Memory, Podcasts and Agentic Features

description: Tecno appears to be preparing to unveil a new Pova series smartphone in India soon. The Transsion Holdings subsidiary is yet to confirm its existence, but ahead of it, an alleged teaser video of the phone has leaked on the Internet. The video shows the handset with a triangular-shaped camera module. Tecno teased a similar phone earlier in January this year. The Tecno Pova 6 series was launched last year with three models.
title: New Tecno Pova Series Phone Could Launch Soon; Alleged Teaser Video Shows Rear Design

description: OnePlus 13T is expected to launch soon in China. Ahead of the unveiling, a company official has shed light on several details about the purported handset via a social media post. It is confirmed to be equipped with a flat screen which may appeal to users who prefer compact yet high-performance handsets. Additionally, the official has teased the inclusion of a new button on the OnePlus 13T which may act as a shortcut key that can be customised for various system actions.
title: OnePlus 13T Confirmed to Get Compact Flat Display and Customisable Shortcut Key

description: Sony LinkBuds Fit were launched in India on Monday. The TWS earphones support noise cancelling, DSEE technology, LDAC audio code, and multi-point connectivity. They offer AI-backed call noise reduction features and are compatible with the Sony Connect app. The headsets have an IPX4 splash-resistant rating and come with Wide Area Tap functionality, which lets users control the earphones by tapping the area in front of their ears instead of the earphone body.
title: Sony LinkBuds Fit With LDAC Support, Up to 21 Hours Total Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: A surprise reveal at the Nintendo Switch 2 livestream last week, The Duskbloods will launch on the new console in 2026. FromSoftware confirmed the game was a multiplayer title with a focus on PvPvE action. Studio president Hidetaka Miyazaki, however, has since clarified that the company would not shift away from single-player titles.
title: The Duskbloods Director Hidetaka Miyazaki Says FromSoftware Not Moving Away From Single-Player Games

description: US SEC has determined that the assets, generally, aren’t securities. The determination applies as long as a crypto asset is backed by a stable currency such as the US dollar, a commodity like gold or a pool of other assets.
title: US SEC Says Stablecoins Aren’t Securities That Require Registration

description: WazirX's proposed restructuring scheme has been approved by majority voters, Zettai announced on Monday, April 7. Zettai stated that 141,476 creditors took part in the voting process out of which 131,659 creditors approved the scheme.
title: WazirX's Restructuring Scheme Approved by Over 93 Percent Creditors, Refunds to Start Soon

description: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G and Narzo 80x 5G are all set to launch in India on April 9. Just days ahead of the official debut, Realme has announced the early bird and limited periods sale details of the new Narzo series smartphones. The Chinese smartphone brand is providing exclusive student benefits, launch offers, and special discounts on the smartphones. Both handsets are confirmed to ship with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets, and will go on sale via Amazon.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G, Narzo 80x 5G Early Bird Sale Dates, Student Offers Announced

description: Chamak: The Conclusion, the final season of the crime-musical drama, is now streaming on SonyLIV as of April 4, 2025. The story follows Kaala as he returns to Punjab, haunted by the mystery of his father's death and drawn into a web of betrayal and secrets. With themes of revenge and family honour, the season brings an intense close to his journey in the high-stakes Punjabi music industry. All episodes have been released for binge viewing, and the show is also accessible via OTTplay Premium.
title: Chamak: The Conclusion Now Streaming on SonyLIV: What You Need to Know

description: The Bondsman is a gripping action-horror series starring Kevin Bacon as a resurrected bounty hunter in a dark, mythological world. All eight episodes dropped on April 3 on Amazon Prime Video. Created by Grainger David and showrun by Erik Oleson, the series weaves chaos, devilish bargains, and supernatural forces into a fast-paced narrative. With a strong supporting cast and slick direction, The Bondsman delivers a complete binge-worthy story under eight hours.
title: The Bondsman Now Available on Prime Video: Kevin Bacon Leads Action-Horror Limited Series

description: Jurassic World: Chaos Theory is the latest animated series in the Jurassic franchise, set years after Fallen Kingdom. It follows the Nublar Six as they reunite in the face of an international conspiracy involving dinosaur trafficking and underground networks. The darker storyline unfolds across borders as the team investigates the disappearance of one of their own. Released on April 3, 2025, the series is available on Netflix in English, with episodes running about 22–24 minutes each.
title: Jurassic World: Chaos Theory Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: Android 16 is the next big OS update for Android devices which is said to be released later this year. According to a report, it will bring a new feature aimed at making app installation faster. Dubbed Cloud Compilation, it targets low-end devices and offloads app compilations to the cloud, eliminating the need of running the dex2oat tool and making the process faster.
title: Android 16 Could Introduces Cloud Compilation for Quick App Installs on Low-End Devices

description: The Malayalam crime comedy Pravinkoodu Shappu, directed by Sreeraj  The Malayalam crime comedy Pravinkoodu Shappu, directed by Sreeraj Sreenivasan, makes its digital debut on Sony LIV on April 11. The film revolves around a mysterious murder at a toddy shop, with a mix of suspense and dark humour. Starring Soubin Shahir, Basil Joseph, and Chemban Vinod Jose, the film was praised for its gripping narrative and performances. Available in Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada and Hindi, Pravinkoodu Shappu promises an entertaining mystery.
title: Pravinkoodu Shappu OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: While we have yet to see the first leaked images of the iPhone 17 series, we have seen plenty of dummy units (obtained from case moulds) that give us a fair idea about what the upcoming iPhone models would look like. The biggest new addition is clearly the iPhone 17 Air, which as per reports may be the slimmest iPhone launched ever. Now, there’s information about an iPhone to be launched several years ahead, to celebrate the phone's 20th anniversary.
title: iPhone 20th Anniversary to Feature a Bold Design That Uses Glass Extensively: Report

description: DeepSeek has collaborated with researchers from Beijing-based Tsinghua University to develop a way to make AI models better adhere to human preferences by offering rewards for more accurate and understandable responses. DeepSeek will release the GRM models on an open source basis.
title: DeepSeek and Tsinghua Developing Self-Improving AI Models

description: iPhone 17 series is expected to be announced in September. The lineup is said to include four models — iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air (or Slim), iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. Early iPhone 17 Pro leaks had suggested the possibility of a drastic design change, but that may not happen as per a new report. The iPhone 17 Pro is said to be more similar to the iPhone 16 Pro, but with a differ back camera layout.
title: iPhone 17 Pro's Design to Be Similar to iPhone 16 Pro, Except for Rear Camera Layout: Mark Gurman

description: Microsoft released an interactive real-time gameplay experience of Quake II in Copilot Labs last week. To build the artificial intelligence (AI) gameplay, the Redmond-based tech giant used its recently released Muse AI models and a new approach dubbed World and Human Action MaskGIT Model (WHAMM). The game demo is currently available as a research preview to everyone.
title: Microsoft Releases an AI-Generated Playable Quake II Game Demo

description: Ola told India’s Ministry of Road Transport and Highways in a March 21 letter that it added customer bookings for 10,866 third-generation e-scooters as well as 1,395 Roadster X motorcycles in its February sales record, citing them as “confirmed orders.” Roadster motorcycles have not been rolled out so far, while third-gen scooter deliveries began in March.
title: Ola Electric Counted Yet-to-Be Launched E-Motorbikes in Its February Sales

description: The valuation of the crypto sector tumbled by 8.10 percent over the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered notable losses on Monday, April 7. From Solana, Ripple, and Dogecoin to Litecoin, Polygon, and Polkadot -- most altcoins also logged losses owing to the ongoing tariff wars between the US and other nations.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Falls to $76,000 Amid Escalating Tariff Wars and Market Turmoil

description: Reliance Jio in March announced new benefits on select prepaid recharge plans in anticipation of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025. The telecom operator has now extended the date till when the offer can be availed of. With the “Unlimited” offer, customers can enjoy a complimentary subscription to JioHotstar with mobile recharges worth Rs. 299 and above, along with a Jio AirFiber and JioFiber trial.
title: Jio Extends ‘Unlimited’ Offer With Free 90-Day JioHotstar Subscription, Other Benefits Till April 15

description: Meta introduced the first artificial intelligence (AI) models in the Llama 4 family on Saturday. The Menlo Park-based tech giant released two models — Llama 4 Scout and Llama 4 Maverick — with native multimodal capabilities to the open community. The company says these are the first open models built with Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architecture.
title: Meta Llama 4 Scout and Maverick AI Models With MoE Architecture Released

description: Eager fans will have to wait a little longer to reserve their Nintendo Switch 2 in the US after Nintendo delayed pre-orders for its next console in the country in light of widespread international tariffs announced by the Trump administration.
title: Nintendo Delays Pre-Orders for Nintendo Switch 2 in the US to Assess Impact of Trump Tariffs

description: Vivo X200 Ultra will be introduced in China alongside the Vivo X200s variant later this month. The company has announced the launch date of the smartphones. The Vivo Pad 5 Pro and Pad SE tablets as well as Vivo Watch 5 smartwatch will be unveiled alongside the handsets. The colour options for the Vivo X200s and the design of the Vivo X200 Ultra have also been revealed.
title: Vivo X200 Ultra, Vivo X200s, Pad 5 Pro, Pad SE, Vivo Watch 5 Launch Set for April 21

description: Infinix Note 50s 5G+ will launch in India next week, the Transsion Holdings subsidiary confirmed through a press release. The Chinese tech brand also shared official images revealing the design and colour options of the new Note series smartphone. The Infinix Note 50s 5G+ is teased to ship with a unique scent-tech feature that lets the handset release a fragrance from its rear panel.
title: Infinix Note 50s 5G+ With Scent-Tech Feature Set to Launch in India on April 18; Colourways Teased

description: Noise Air Buds Pro 6 have been introduced in India. The TWS earphones are equipped with 12.4mm drivers and support dual device connectivity. They are claimed to offer up to 49dB hybrid active noise cancellation (ANC) and up to seven hours of playback time on a single charge. The Air Buds Pro 6 support spatial audio, Google Fast Pair, in-ear detection, and low latency of up to 50ms.
title: Noise Air Buds Pro 6 With LHDC Support, Up to 50 Hours Total Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Samsung’s rollout of its Android 15-based One UI 7 operating system (OS) is yet to reach completion but the company is said to already have plans for an early launch of its next iteration. According to a report, One UI 8 based on Android 16 will be offered out-of-the-box with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip 7 foldables.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 to Reportedly Come With Android 16-Based One UI 8

description: WhatsApp is said to be testing new features for its Android app to improve the overall audio and video calling experience. According to claims by a feature tracker, the instant messaging platform is developing a new feature which lets users mute their microphone before accepting a voice call. Meanwhile, it is testing emoji reactions for video calls and the ability to turn off the camera before a video call is accepted.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Developing New Mute and Camera Off Buttons for Audio, Video Calls

description: Poco M7 5G was recently launched in India as an entry-level phone priced under Rs. 10,000. It features a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, runs on Android 14 , and offers 128GB of inbuilt storage, and a 50-megapixel camera. Is it the best budget smartphone with 5G connectivity you can purchase in India? Find out in our Poco M7 5G review.
title: Poco M7 5G Review: Familiar Territory
